name: 8ball
description: ask 8ball a question.

name: cat
description: drops a random cat image.

name: dog
description: drops a random dog image.

name: drop
description: drops a random rap line. optional: add argument to send 1-10 lines.

name: fuck
description: well.. says fuck you.

name: stfricku
description: tell someone to shut the frick up.

name: stfu
description: tell someone to shut the fuck up.

name: char
description: returns a random available character

name: claim
description: claim a  character

name: trade
description: trade a character with another user

name: color
description:
color: assigns a premade color to you. available colors: alizarin, pomegranate, carrot, pumpkin, sunflower, orange, turquoise, greensea, emerald, nephritis, peterriver, belizehole, amethyst, wisteria.
hex: assigns a custom color to you. hex color code expected (e.G. #12dce3).

name: removecolor
description: remove a color role from yourself.

name: avatar
description: returns the avatar of the mentioned user.

name: help
description: lists all commands.

name: invite
description: get the discord bots invite link.

name: server
description: shows information about a server.

name: user
description: shows information about a user

name: blacklist
description: blacklist or unblacklist someone from joining voicechat or a server. requires KICK_MEMBERS permission.

name: blacklisted
description: list the blacklisted users on a server. requires KICK_MEMBERS permission.

name: clear
description: clear x amount of messages. requires MANAGE_MESSAGES permission.

name: verification
description: adds verification to channel or selects role for verification. requires MANAGE_CHANNELS permission.
